com.codecool.shop.model

Class Order

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.codecool.shop.model.Order

  • public class Order
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains methods which are modifies or read the content of the order of the user.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Order

        public Order()
        This is the constructor. It uses the static currentId as the id of the instance and than increment it so every order has a different id. Note: This is bad practice as database should handle the id.

    • Method Detail

      • getOrder

        public static Order getOrder(spark.Request request)
        This method gets the Order instance of a current session or create a new Order instance if it doesn't created yet.
        Parameters:
        request - A Spark request
        Returns:
        An Order instance from the request session.

      • getOrderLines

        public java.util.Set<Lineitem> getOrderLines()

      • getLine

        public Lineitem getLine(int id)
        This method gets one Lineitem instance from the Order based on its id.
        Parameters:
        id - The id attribute of a Lineitem instance
        Returns:
        Lineitem instance

      • addToTotal

        public void addToTotal(float total)
        This method increments the total price of the Order.
        Parameters:
        total - A float to add to the price (The linePrice attribute of a Lineitem)

      • addToTotalQuantity

        public void addToTotalQuantity(int total)
        This method just left here, we dont use it lol.
        Parameters:
        total - The quantity attribute of a Lineitem instance.

      • subFromTotal

        public void subFromTotal(float total)

      • addLine

        public boolean addLine(Lineitem line)
        This method adds a new Lineitem to the Order. It also increase the total price and the totalQuantity attribute of the Order.
        Parameters:
        line - A Lineitem instance
        Returns:
        a boolean but we don't use the value of it
